channel.title: Were Should My Next Server Start?
channel.description:
Hey people,
if you don't know me im Liamsford. Im the owner and me and Vorro Scape are the creater's. If you have played b4 it starts out at the party room. Were should my next server start at?
Please Help.

item.title: Were Should My Next Server Start?
item.dc:creator: @run run
item.description:
@run wrote:

try castle wars or pits =P that’d be awesome.

Read full topic
item.source: Were Should My Next Server Start?

item.title: Were Should My Next Server Start?
item.dc:creator: @Eportal Eportal
item.description:
@Eportal wrote:

Hmmmm maybe you could like make it a place everything is reachable, banks, tons of shops, high level training, wild acessable from there… oh wait ARDOUGNE!

Read full topic
item.source: Were Should My Next Server Start?

item.title: Were Should My Next Server Start?
item.dc:creator: @Pluse_Of_The_Maggots Pluse Of The Maggots
item.description:
@Pluse_Of_The_Maggots wrote:

I think a place where everything you need to start off with is like in a dungeon or something old but kool…

Read full topic
item.source: Were Should My Next Server Start?

item.title: Were Should My Next Server Start?
item.dc:creator: @x0_0wn x0 0wn
item.description:
@x0_0wn wrote:

I’d say make the starting place the mage arena, put shops and training stuff in there.
And a pking spot outside…
I’d like that.

Read full topic
item.source: Were Should My Next Server Start?

item.title: Were Should My Next Server Start?
item.dc:creator: @Eportal Eportal
item.description:
@Eportal wrote:

Some place where dudes can buy stuff to start off with and kill things, so i suggest maybe in verrock or maybe Fally or… Seers village, but you get the idea, some place where dudes can kill, shop, and have fun.

Read full topic
item.source: Were Should My Next Server Start?
